plot: Barney Ross leads the "Expendables", a band of highly skilled mercenaries including knife enthusiast Lee Christmas, martial arts expert Yin Yang, heavy weapons specialist Hale Caesar, demolitionist Toll Road and loose-cannon sniper Gunner Jensen. When the group is commissioned by the mysterious Mr. Church to assassinate the merciless dictator of a small South American island, Barney and Lee head to the remote locale to scout out their opposition. Once there, they meet with local rebel Sandra and discover the true nature of the conflict engulfing the city. When they escape the island and Sandra stays behind, Ross must choose to either walk away and save his own life - or attempt a suicidal rescue mission that might just save his soul.

m.role: Badass Grandpa: One of the first images of the movie was a shot of Stallone's character, barechested and covered in tattoos. Nearly everyone was slack-jawed, saying, "That guy is over 60?!" The series also stars 47-year-old (in the first film) Randy Couture, then-actively competing mixed martial artist and MMA's original Badass Grandpa. Chuck Norris is 72, and looks no older than 40-50.
Bash Brothers: All of the Expendables.
Casanova Wannabe: Gunnar proves to be this towards Maggie in the sequel, clamming up attempting to impress her with a Rubik's Cube and firing off the lamest pun in the history of lame puns.
Shirtless Scene: Sylvester Stallone's character and his insane abs.

f.role: Action Girl: Maggie in the sequel. Luna in 3.
Amazon Brigade: There are plans for the third film to feature female action stars. We eventually get just one.
The Expendables 3 is planned to feature female action stars.
Damsel in Distress: Sandra. Lacy becomes this to Lee when her latest boyfriend proves to be a jerk.
Rebellious Princess: Sandra, General Garza's daughter.
The Chick: Sandra. Maggie in the sequel.

name: The Expendables
